article: An old man had three children, all boys. When they had grown up, he called them together and told them that he was very  _  and no longer able to provide,  _  for himself .He ordered them to go out and bring him food and clothing. The three brothers  set out  , and after a very long while they came to a large  _  . They decided that once they got across they would  _  . The eldest told the youngest to take the middle road, and the second to go to the right,  _  he himself would go to the left. Then, in a year's time, they would  _  to the same spot. So they parted, and at the end of a year, as  _  , they found their way back to the riverside. The eldest asked the youngest what he had gotten during his travels, and the boy  _  : I have nothing but a  _  . If you look into it, you can see all over the country, no matter how far away." When asked  in turn  what he had gotten, the second brother replied : "Only a pair of sandals that are so full of  _  that if one puts them on one can walk at once to any place in the country in one step." Then the eldest himself, said: " I ,  _  , have obtained but little, a kind of medicine, that is all. But let us look into the mirror and see how father  got on  ." The youngest  _  his mirror, and they all looked into it and saw that their father was already  _  .Then the elder said: "Let us  _  home and see what we can do," So the second brought out his sandals, and all three placed their feet inside them and ,  _  , they reached their father's grave. Then the eldest took the  _  out of his bag, and poured it over the grave. At once their father  got up  , as if nothing had been the matter with him. Now which of these three sons has performed the best?
